sysevent_email_action.description: Notify PrintSmart when a supply quantity is updated and the amount left is within 40% of the minimum quantity.
sysevent_email_action.message_html:
The current amount of remaining stock for ${supply_type} supplies is near its minimum quantity.

The current remaining quantity for this supply is ${supply_quantity} units, and its minimum quantity is ${minimum_quantity} units.

Please consider ordering additional supplies for this item.
sysevent_email_action.name: Notify PrintSmart when Near Min Quantity
sysevent_email_action.subject: ${supply_type} Supply Amount is Near Minimum Quantity
sysevent_email_action.sys_name: Notify PrintSmart when Near Min Quantity
